name: Modern Sofa
description: A sleek and stylish modern sofa with a comfortable seating experience and elegant design.

name: Wooden Dining Table
description: A sturdy wooden dining table that fits perfectly in any dining room. Seats up to 6 people.

name: Office Desk
description: A functional office desk with ample storage space and a clean, modern look.

name: King Size Bed
description: A luxurious king-size bed with a high-quality mattress and elegant headboard.

name: Recliner Chair
description: A comfortable recliner chair perfect for relaxing after a long day. Features adjustable reclining positions.

name: Bookcase
description: A stylish bookcase with adjustable shelves to accommodate books of various sizes.

name: TV Stand
description: A contemporary TV stand with ample space for your media components and cable management.

name: Accent Chair
description: An elegant accent chair that adds a touch of sophistication to any room. Available in various colors.

name: Coffee Table
description: A modern coffee table with a sleek design and a glass top. Perfect for your living room.

name: Nightstand
description: A compact nightstand with a drawer and shelf, ideal for bedside storage.

name: Dining Chair
description: A comfortable dining chair with a padded seat and stylish design. Available in sets of 2 or 4.

name: Dressers
description: A spacious dresser with multiple drawers for storing clothes and accessories. Available in different finishes.
